info.name: Airlines Coverage API
info.description: API for managing airlines, airports, and their coverage

item.name: Get a specific airline by ID

response.name: Return the airline
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "American Airlines",
  "description": "American Airlines is a major US airline.",
  "foundationDate": "1955-04-02T04:00:53.603Z",
  "website": "https://www.aa.com"
}

response.name: The airline has been updated
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "American Airlines",
  "description": "American Airlines is a major US airline.",
  "foundationDate": "1955-04-02T04:00:53.603Z",
  "website": "https://www.aa.com"
}

item.name: Associate an airport with an airline

response.name: The airport has been associated with the airline
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "American Airlines",
  "description": "American Airlines is a major US airline.",
  "foundationDate": "1955-04-02T04:00:53.603Z",
  "website": "https://www.aa.com"
}

item.name: Get a specific airport for an airline

response.name: Return the airport
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "John F. Kennedy International Airport",
  "code": "JFK",
  "country": "United States",
  "city": "New York"
}

item.name: Remove an airport from an airline

response.name: The airport has been removed from the airline

item.name: Get all airports for an airline

response.name: Return all airports for the airline
The airports have been updated
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "American Airlines",
  "description": "American Airlines is a major US airline.",
  "foundationDate": "1955-04-02T04:00:53.603Z",
  "website": "https://www.aa.com"
}

response.name: Return all airlines
The airline has been created
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "American Airlines",
  "description": "American Airlines is a major US airline.",
  "foundationDate": "1955-04-02T04:00:53.603Z",
  "website": "https://www.aa.com"
}

item.name: Get a specific airport by ID

response.name: Return the airport
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "John F. Kennedy International Airport",
  "code": "JFK",
  "country": "United States",
  "city": "New York"
}

response.name: The airport has been updated
response.body:

  "code": "JFK",
  "country": "United States",
  "city": "New York"

The airport has been created

  "country": "United States",
